original_text:
My people consult a wooden idol,
    and a diviner’s rod speaks to them.
A spirit of prostitution leads them astray;
    they are unfaithful to their God.
korean_text: 내 백성이 나무에게 묻고 그 막대기는 그들에게 고하나니 이는 그들이 음란한 마음에 미혹되어 하나님을 버리고 음행하였음이니라

sentences.original_text: My people consult a wooden idol,
and a diviner's rod speaks to them.
A spirit of prostitution leads them astray;
sentences.korean_translation: 음행의 영이 그들을 길 잃게 하며;

sentences.original_text: they are unfaithful to their God.
